noun.definition: A point or level beyond which something does not or may not extend or pass.
noun.example: There is a limit to the amount of money we can spend.

noun.definition: A restriction on the size or amount of something permissible or possible.

verb.definition: Set or serve as a limit to.
verb.example: Try to limit the amount of sugar you eat.

usage_examples: He reached the limit of his patience.
